text: Reminder: There are lots of great ways to stay connected with what’s happening in HubSpot development. To be made aware of any changes that affect developers we recommend <https://developers.HubSpot.com/changelog|subscribing to our developer changelog>. We post announcements about new developer facing functionality as well as communicate from there if we need to make <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/breaking-change-definition|breaking changes>.
Not sure where to give the display width feedback … but <https://HubSpotdev.slack.com/archives/C26E7JT8V/p1643820371643329|here is some regarding slider number fields>
Oh nice, thanks for this! I'll get this to the team.

Sorry you had a rough time Dustin, I know ya worked hard on it.

Sometimes it comes down to keeping a small MVP then adding stuff on top once your baseline is set. Easier said than done though.

Hope you made the deadline! Excited to see what you turned in.
